title: The most important factor in promoting efforts

content.question: According to the article, what is the most important factor in promoting efforts to protect the environment?

choices.label: Convincing people to stop using plastic bags
Passing laws to ban the use of plastics bags
Raising awareness of environmental protection among ordinary people

content.answer: Raising awareness of environmental protection among ordinary people
